name: Great Deceiver
storyline:
Still now the deeds of lust are reigning even more deeply Mamiya Marie.
The place she has appeared in is the super gorgeous fitness club called "Royal Family Fitness Club" that her Mamiya Corporation and the Sugimoto Pharmacy are managing in cooperation.
Marie, as her personal trainer, has designated not men with built up bodies but the protagonist who has got a normal body.
And so, an obscene and sweet training pursuing the beauty begins.
summary: Marie Mamiya reigns supreme, and by her whim, she'll train an ordinary man into shape—in the pursuit of beauty.
